name: Rich Snippets Enhancement For Woocommerce and Rank Math
author: Yahia Ashraf

sections.description:
as we have an issue for making rich snippets perfect and more automated we created this simple plugin with love to make it easy for all you>
Rich Snippets Enhancement For Woocommerce and Rank Math make the price valid until schema value to be at the next year from now.
and puts mpn value to be as the sku value.
sections.installation:
Installation procedure:

  1. Deactivate plugin if you have the previous version installed.
  2. Extract “rank-math-enhancement-woocommerce.zip” archive content to the “/wp-content/plugins/rank-math-enhancement-woocommerce” directory.
  3. Activate “Rich Snippets Enhancement For Woocommerce and Rank Math” plugin via ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress admin menu.
  4. That’s all :).
sections.changelog:
= v1.1
*Dont Make Any Change If woocommerce & Rank Math Is Not Active
*More Dynamic Way For Getting MPN & Price Valid Until Values

= v1
* First Release
